list.question: Why can't I register by myself?
list.answer: Registration is done only through our team to ensure the correct setup of the platform.

list.question: Where can I see all the features of the platform?
list.answer: You can request a demo from our team or check the documentation.

list.question: How do I start a demo?
list.answer: To try the demo, click the “Demo” button in the top right corner of the site. We will contact you and show you all the platform's features.

list.question: How do I know my request was sent?
list.answer: After submitting the form, you will see a confirmation on the screen. We will also send a notification to your email.

list.question: What if I don’t get a reply?
list.answer: We usually respond within 2 hours. If you haven’t received a reply, please send the request again or contact us directly.

list.question: How can I contact you?
list.answer: You can write to us via the website form, messengers, or email. We always try to respond quickly.

list.question: What services do you provide?
list.answer: We develop websites, mobile and desktop applications, diploma and academic projects. From simple landing pages to complex systems — tailored to your needs.

list.question: What does website development include?
list.answer: We create modern responsive websites: landing pages, corporate portals, online stores, and more. Beautiful design, user-friendly interface, and high loading speed — everything your business needs.

list.question: Do you develop mobile applications?
list.answer: Yes, we build apps for iOS, Android, and Windows. They help automate processes and improve services.

list.question: Do you help with diploma projects?
list.answer: Yes, we develop diploma and coursework projects, as well as educational applications. We guarantee uniqueness and professional execution.

list.question: What are your main principles of work?
list.answer: We value quality, speed, and results. We create digital solutions at the highest level to exceed client expectations.
